title: Canada bans conversion therapy, telling LGBTQ residents 'we'll always stand up for you'
content:
1. Canada bans conversion therapy, telling LGBTQ residents 'we'll always stand up for you'  USA TODAY
  2. Canada bans conversion therapy, a practice Trudeau calls 'despicable and degrading'  CNN
  3. Canada bans conversion therapy  CBS News
  4. Canada bans 'conversion therapy,' threatens therapists with prison  Fox News
  5. Canada outlaws discredited LGBTQ 'conversion therapy' practices  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: カナダは転換療法を禁止し、LGBTQの住民に「我々は常にあなたのために立ち上がる」と伝えています。
加拿大禁止转换疗法，告诉LGBTQ居民 "我们将永远支持你"。
加拿大禁止轉換療法，告訴LGBTQ居民 "我們將永遠支持你"。
